relatedBlades.title: Enterprise-grade security and performance for healthcare providers
relatedBlades.copy: Transform healthcare delivery and empower care teams with secure access to medical systems and protected health information (PHI). Enhance threat protection, deliver seamless patient experiences, and boost compliance, all from a single, secure cloud platform.

featureLists.title: Trust Cloudflare to keep patient data safe

columnContent.title: Protect patient data and strengthen compliance
columnContent.description: Defend against ransomware, malware and unauthorized access across cloud, SaaS, and hybrid environments, reducing risk and boosting regulatory compliance.

columnContent.title: Enhance clinician productivity from anywhere
columnContent.description: Empower remote clinical teams with fast, reliable access to medical systems from any location, without the frustrations of traditional VPNs.

columnContent.title: Deliver secure virtual visits and digital experiences
columnContent.description: Safeguard patient-facing applications with a unified security platform and intelligent global network that prevents breaches while ensuring uninterrupted availability.

columnContent.title: Increase IT and security efficiency
columnContent.description: Onboard new apps, manage user permissions, investigate incidents, and update policies faster and with more visibility from a single control plane and unified policy engine.

relatedBlades.title: Revolutionizing digital healthcare through security, speed, and scalability
Stay ahead of evolving cyber threats
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's SASE security solutions shield healthcare systems from phishing, ransomware and malware, leveraging peerless threat intelligence to preemptively block hundreds of billions of threats daily. Solutions like Magic Firewall, Remote Browser Isolation, and Cloud Email Security reduce the risk of breach, eliminate security gaps, and enhance network visibility.

link.elementName: Cloudflare for Healthcare - Stay ahead of evolving cyber threats - Link

relatedBlades.title: Ensure secure access to systems and PHI
relatedBlades.copy: Eliminate reliance on VPNs with Cloudflare's Zero Trust services, enabling fast, secure, and reliable access to essential medical systems and PHI for internal and third-party clinicians. Products like Zero Trust Network Access and Data Loss Prevention enable healthcare organizations to control access to sensitive patient data, onboard users more quickly, and simplify policy enforcement.

link.elementName: Cloudflare for Healthcare - Ensure secure access to systems and PHI - Link

relatedBlades.title: Streamline compliance and minimize risk
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's single composable platform and unified policy engine help you achieve compliance and manage evolving risk. Zero Trust and network services including Access, CASB, Gateway, and Magic Firewall work together to let you establish, enforce, and monitor application access while preventing malware and ransomware from getting onto your network.

link.elementName: Cloudflare for Healthcare - Streamline compliance and minimize risk - Link

relatedBlades.title: Accelerate and secure patient-facing applications
relatedBlades.copy: Patient-facing applications require robust security to handle sensitive data and maintain availability. Cloudflare's unified application security (WAF, DDoS protection and API Security) and global network scale accelerate application performance and deliver seamless virtual care experiences while ensuring patient trust.

link.elementName: Cloudflare for Healthcare - Accelerate and secure patient-facing applications - Link

relatedBlades.title: Ebook: The enterprise guide to securing and scaling AI
relatedBlades.copy: Learn why enterprises struggle to meaningfully build and secure AI infrastructure at scale, why hyperscalers' AI infrastructure often falls short, and how to overcome those struggles.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE)
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition reflects our continued commitment to provide one security platform that scales seamlessly from network to cloud, protecting all users and data across applications and AI.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare a Leader in "The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025
columnContent.description: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in "The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025" report. Cloudflare received the highest score in the current offering category.

relatedBlades.title: Flo Health secures personal data of a global user base with help from Cloudflare

columnContent.copy:
Flo is the #1 most popular female health app worldwide, with 400 million total installs and 75 million monthly active users. With a global user base, Flo Health must comply with numerous regulations such as the EU's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). At the same time, the company faces the challenge of defending itself from the rapidly evolving threat landscape which is marked by increasingly sophisticated and frequent cyber attacks.

After migrating their traffic to the Cloudflare global network and switching on the Cloudflare Web Application Firewall (WAF), Secure DNS, and DDoS protection solutions, they saw immediate improvements—running 27% faster with higher cache rates—while estimating that Cloudflare blocked nearly 99% of all attacks before they reached their website.

__"After GPT4 was released, we analyzed our statistics in Cloudflare Email Security and found that attacks had jumped by 20% within one month. We rely on Cloudflare, which is handling these attacks very well."__ ![Flo logo](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/6JG3SgrdkCERoN8VcHqdnc/994f3411a7c19dc79edaded013454123/Flo-logo.png) Roman Bugaev
Chief Technology Officer, Flo
